name: Screw Logic the RPG
description:
This is a game I made mostly in high school (5-6 years ago!) and worked on and off of since then. I weirdly kept the horrible design decisions for comedic reasons so LOOK OUT THE GAME ISN'T THAT GREAT. I just think 1. archiving my game is good and 2. the game is certainly interesting to play, even if just to laugh at.

This game features: 

  • Terrible platforming
  • Awful characters
  • Grating music
  • Occasional sfx
  • The humor of an elementary schooler
  • 7 Endings!!!!!!
